data.name: Hush Hush - Official Artbook
data.detailed_description: This Artbook PDF contains all the behind-the-scenes concept art, backgrounds, character pin-ups and poses from Hush Hush including unused artwork as well! Enjoy these beautiful hi-res illustrations and remember to play the game first because there are spoilers in some of these illustrations. This artbook has over 200 pages and looks stunning!
data.about_the_game: This Artbook PDF contains all the behind-the-scenes concept art, backgrounds, character pin-ups and poses from Hush Hush including unused artwork as well! Enjoy these beautiful hi-res illustrations and remember to play the game first because there are spoilers in some of these illustrations. This artbook has over 200 pages and looks stunning!
data.short_description: A gorgeous digital artbook that includes concept art and developer notes, providing insight into the visual development of Hush Hush.

fullgame.name: Hush Hush - Only Your Love Can Save Them

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Modern Intel/AMD CPU 1.6GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities. Anything made since 2004 should work
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The artbook is a PDF and will install to your game directory

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: Modern Intel/AMD CPU 1.6GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities. Anything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The artbook is a PDF and will install to your game directory

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or newer or SteamOS
  • Processor: Modern Intel/AMD CPU 1.6GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities. Anything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The artbook is a PDF and will install to your game directory

content_descriptors.notes: The illustrations contain partial nudity, alcohol and some instances of blood/death.
